title: The 'Bat Rule' Is the 2015 'Tuck Rule' - Mike Pereira
text:
> Sports The 'Bat Rule' Is the 2015 'Tuck Rule' - Mike Pereira NFL rules analyst Mike Pereira on the NFL's response to the missed call during last week's Monday Night game and how the refs responded on Sunday. The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
